text: Montval-sur-Loir is a commune. It is found in the Pays de la Loire region in the Sarthe department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 October 2016 and consists of the former communes of Château-du-Loir (the seat), Montabon and Vouvray-sur-Loir.Arrêté préfectoral 28 June 2016 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Sarthe
title: Montval-sur-Loir
